attributes.action: ensure that drugs and proceedures are available to ALL british citizens regardless of cost
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Drugs and procedures are being withheld from patients and ill people based on cost - we request that any drug or procedure are made freely available to any British citizen who need them - the rich can afford to buy the drug but it is yet again the poor who will die - stop providing treatment to those who have not paid into the NHS and start to look after the citizens of this country
